name: The Carlyle Group Inc.
description: The Carlyle Group Inc. is a global investment firm specializing in private equity, real assets, and private credit. Founded in 1987 by David Rubenstein, William Conway, and Daniel D'Aniello, Carlyle has grown to become one of the largest and most diversified investment firms in the world. With over $300 billion in assets under management, Carlyle operates across various sectors, including technology, healthcare, aerospace, and financial services. The firm employs a disciplined investment approach that combines deep industry knowledge with operational expertise to drive growth and value creation in its portfolio companies. Carlyle's investment philosophy emphasizes long-term partnerships with management teams and a commitment to responsible investing, ensuring that environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors are integrated into its investment processes. The firm has a broad global footprint, with offices in North America, Europe, Asia, and the Middle East, allowing it to source unique investment opportunities and leverage its extensive network. Carlyle is also known for its focus on innovation and strategic transformation, helping its portfolio companies navigate market challenges and capitalize on new opportunities. As a leader in the private equity space, Carlyle continues to seek out high-quality investments while maintaining a strong commitment to creating value for its investors and stakeholders.
